pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A Python package to read and write SAS(sas7bdat, sas7bcat, xport/xpt), SPSS (sav, zsav, por) and Stata (dta) files into/from pandas data frames. It is a wrapperaround the C library readstat.
Please visit out project home page for more information:
https://github.com/Roche/pyreadstat
